Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a blog post or a featured post on the portfolio.

platform.description: The platform where the post was originally published (e.g., LinkedIn, Instagram).

description.description: A short description or excerpt of the post.

link.description: The direct URL to the full post.

image.description: The URL for the post's cover image.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation tools, describing the image content.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the post was created.

SiteConfig.title: Site Configuration
SiteConfig.description: Stores global configuration settings for the website.

founderImageUrl.description: The URL for the founder's profile image.

AnalyticsEvent.title: Analytics Event
AnalyticsEvent.description: Represents a single analytics event, like a page view.

path.description: The path of the page that was viewed.

sessionId.description: A unique identifier for the user's session.

/posts/{postId}.description: Stores all the featured posts for the portfolio.

/analyticsEvents/{eventId}.description: Stores analytics events, like page views.
